vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.6.11;
son of: Joash (H3101);
father of: Jether (H3500), Abimelech (H0040H) and Jotham (H3147); also called Jerubbaal at Jdg.6.32; 7.1; 8.29,35; 9.1,2,5,16,19,24,28,57; 1xJerubbesheth at 2Sa.11.21;
§ Gideon = "hewer"
youngest son of Joash of the Abiezrites, fifth judge of Israel who led the Israelites against the Midianites
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Joás; juez de Israel; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基甸 这个n pr m在希伯來文的意思是 "砍伐人"
亞比以謝族的約阿施的最小的兒子, 以色列第五個士師, 率領以色列人與米甸人爭戰
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基甸 这个n pr m在希伯来文的意思是 "砍伐人"
亚比以谢族的约阿施的最小的儿子, 以色列第五个士师, 率领以色列人与米甸人争战
